reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful and well-made, with soft lining and comfortable wear.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Say yes to the dress!
items.body: Sexiest I’ve ever felt in a dress! Fits in all the right places! The string on the dress is kind of cheap looking tbh. Like other reviewers have stated. I didn’t have any problems with it…but, I wish they’d upgrade it! Want it in other colors. Read more
items.author: Chad Pope

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved!!!
items.body: I loved everything about this dress! The fit was exactly how it was sized and i loved the color. Read more
items.author: Tayana R.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Almost amazing
items.body: When I first opened the dress out of the package, I was a little bit let down because the sequins are clear and it sort of loses the rich chocolate brown color. They probably look just fine on the lighter colors like the purple in the blue. The other disappointing thing I noticed right away, was the cords. A few other reviewers also mentioned they looked cheap and I agree. Almost like something you’d find on camping equipment lol. The last negative impression was left when I looked at the ground and noticed tons of fibers I think? Assuming they came from the lining material or the cords, I included a picture. Any area that I was adjusting the dress or standing for a few minutes in my apartment I noticed these would collect underneath me. Now for the positives! I was very impressed by the overall fit of the dress as well as the material. You can tell from some of my close-up photos that it does a great job, hiding, lumps, and bumps. I hate when you can tell where someone’s belly button or their underwear lines is, it looks trashy, and this was great at hiding anything. The inner lining was also fairly soft and comfortable against the skin, and there wasn’t anywhere that I noticed the sequins rubbing, which is great, because I have wore dresses and tops in the past that left my arms raw by the end of the night. Unfortunately for me this was just too tight on the shoulders and arms and I don’t have the biggest arms but I do work out, so maybe others wouldn’t have this issue? Ultimately, this was the reason I didn’t keep the dress because I felt like I couldn’t move comfortably. The hips and waist fit like an absolute dream though! For the right person, this dress is the perfect designer dupe for less! For reference, I’m wearing the size medium. I am 5‘10“ tall, 165lbs, 34C bra and I’m not wearing anything in the photo, 29” waist, 40” hips, and my biceps are about 13” circumference. Read more
items.author: Kristen Brown

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sexy
items.body: True to size and very sexy. Read more
items.author: NORMA S.

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars So cheaply made
items.body: Do not buy this CHEAP dress!!!! Sure it’s cute, and I was very happy, until I put it on. This dress is ridiculously expensive for the quality. As soon as I put it on, the floor was covered in sequins. Looked like at least half of them fell off. Then I tried to tighten the draw string, the thing snaps right off… I barely put any pressure on it. The dress is beautiful for sure but please don’t waste THIS MUCH money on this cheaply made piece of crap. Read more
items.author: KHillis

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Tangled strings
items.body: The dress itself is quality and the color is amazing but the tangled strings wasn’t great. Returned item for a different one Read more
items.author: LSB

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Ok dress, poor quality control
items.body: The dress is pretty and could be of better quality with better workmanship. The sequins fall off, the arms are a bit tight and the cording is cheap. I had to return mine because the front cord arrived detached and the right arm near the wrist area was cut irregularly. I couldn't get my arm through it, or even a broomstick for that matter. I'm 6', 28 waist and 163 pounds. Size medium fit. Read more
items.author: Topazamazon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sequin dress
items.body: This dress is gorgeous! It’s heavier than expected because of the sequins, but it’s comfortable. The lining is very soft. True to size. It’s beautiful and I can’t wait to wear it! Read more
items.author: Sam P

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, As Shown, Purple, Black, Green, Flugreen. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
